mapper.sql: id, git_project_id as gitProjectId, commit_path as commitPath, created, creator, submit_time as submitTime, submit_erp as submitErp, comment, commit_id as commitId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO git_his ( git_project_id , commit_path, created, creator, submit_time, submit_erp, `comment`, commit_id ) VALUES( #{gitProjectId}, #{commitPath}, now(), #{creator}, now(), #{submitErp}, #{comment}, #{commitId} )
